description.value:
The magic of your patron ensures you always have certain spells nearby; when you reach a Warlock level specified in the Great Old One Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Great Old One Spells
Warlock LevelSpells
3@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDetectThou]{Detect Thoughts}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDissonantW]{Dissonant Whispers}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplHideousLau]{Hideous Laughter}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMessage000]{Message}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplPhantasFor]{Phantasmal Force}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplViciousMoc]{Vicious Mockery}
5@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplClairvoyan]{Clairvoyance}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSending000]{Sending}
7@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCompulsion]{Compulsion}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDominateBe]{Dominate Beast}
9@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDominatePe]{Dominate Person}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplTelekinesi]{Telekinesis}
